title: Protocol Village: Degen Community, Syndicate Launch 'Degen Chain'
description: The latest in blockchain tech upgrades, funding announcements and deals. For the period of March 28-April 3.

title: Degen Chain Debuts on Base as 'Blockchain Equivalent of Las Vegas'
description: The community-first blockchain is built with a mix of tech from Arbitrum to Base and tapping layer-3 tools from Syndicate.

title: Atlas Navi’s Drive2Earn 2.0 offers big discounts on petrol prices
description:
Bucharest, Romania, 28 March 2024: Atlas Navi, a trailblazer in AI-powered navigation, has unveiled Drive2Earn 2.0 — enhancing rewards for drivers as it sets its sights on overtaking Tesla as a market leader in capturing and analyzing vast quantities of data from dashcams. The app, which has now been downloaded more than 700,000 times worldwide, […]

title: HSBC Launches Gold Token For Hong Kong Investors
description: HSBC Hong Kong has become the first financial institution to offer tokenized RWA by launching gold tokens for retail investors in Hong Kong.

title: BC Gov’t escalates legal battle against QuadrigaCX co-founder
description: The government of British Columbia has launched a fresh legal action against Michael Patryn in a further legal case. He is one of the co-founders of the defunct cryptocurrency exchange QuadrigaCX. The third unexplained wealth order application in the Province was announced by the Minister of Public Safety and Solicitor General, Mike Farnworth. This legal […]

title: Pepe (PEPE) does social work as Arbitrum (ARB) unlocks tokens; Algotech (ALGT) surpasses $2.5 million in presale
description: Pepe (PEPE) will offer funds for the conservation of frogs and their habitat. Arbitrum (ARB) has unlocked the tokens vetted since February 2023. title: Stablecoin protocol Prisma Finance hacked for over $11m
description: Stablecoin protocol Prisma Finance experienced a significant cyberattack, resulting in a nearly $11.6 million loss.

title: What will happen after the Bitcoin halving? Experts weigh in on historic moment
description: Experts contribute their opinions to predict and decipher what will happen after the Bitcoin halving next month.

title: Bitcoin Cash Prepares for Halving: BCH Price Spikes 16% Ahead of April 4 Event
description: As Bitcoin Cash’s halving event on approaches April 4, Bitcoin Cash (BCH) has gained significant momentum, with an 85% surge on the monthly chart. The impending halving, which will reduce the block reward from 6.25 BCH to 3.125 BCH, has spurred bullish sentiment. title: KuCoin’s $10M Air-Drop Amid AML Allegations
description:
This move comes at a critical juncture for KuCoin, facing scrutiny from U.S. authorities. The exchange is accused of deliberately ignoring Anti-Money Laundering (AML) regulations to grow its operations.
